abstract: Ten thousand workers who demonstrate products and 1,200 membership jobs will be cut at its Sam’s Club warehouses.
snippet: Ten thousand workers who demonstrate products and 1,200 membership jobs will be cut at its Sam’s Club warehouses.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart Stores, the nation’s largest retailer, is cutting about 11,200 jobs at its Sam’s Club warehouses, the company told its employees in a memo on Sunday.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Tells Employees It Will Cut 11,200 Jobs
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Tells Employees It Will Cut 11,200 Jobs
